description:
A short canyon prospect in the Columbia Gorge. Lower Greenleaf Falls has 3-4 back-to-back drops in a narrow gorge. Creek has a relatively high pay-to-play as access is not great.

Approach

Best access is likely via the PCT from the trailhead near Bonneville Dam. Another more complicated route might be from Blue Lake to the east, although this crosses private property.

Descent

  • R1:
  • R2:
  • R3:

Exit

Exit the creek immediately below the falls to avoid private land.

Red tape

There is a lot of private property in the area. Please respect all postings.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Oregonhikers TR

Background

  • Upper Greenleaf Falls is located on the same creek about 2mi to the north.
name: Greenleaf Creek
